description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Help your snowman spread Christmas cheer in this simple but addictive game.  Complete with Christmas music, a high score table, and a simple system to change players between games, this really is a festive treat for the whole family.
